 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂנֵא‎</span><sub>145</sub> **verb** ==hate== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>4</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנאי‎</span> ***my foes***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנאם‎</span> ***foe*** SabDenkm<sup>No. 12, 1. 9</sup> compare Ib.<sup>No. 7, 1. 9</sup> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, No. 173, 1. 6</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***hate***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְנָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***id.***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָנְאָה‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hater***, etc.; Ethiopic ***hate*** is <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal**<sub>128</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Deut.12.31|Deut 12:31]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂנֵאָהּ‎</span> [[2Sam.13.15|2Sam 13:15]] +; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂנֵאתָ‎</span> [[Ps.5.6|Ps 5:6]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂנֵאתַ֫נִי‎</span> [[Judg.14.16|Judg 14:16]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂנָא‎</span> [[Prov.13.5|Prov 13:5]]; [[Prov.26.28|Prov 26:28]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂפּנָאֶ֑ךָּ‎</span> 9:s, etc.; Imperative masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂנְאוּ‎</span> [[Amos.9.15|Amos 9:15]]; [[Ps.97.10|Ps 97:10]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂנאֹ‎</span> [[Judg.15.2|Judg 15:2]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂנאֹ‎</span> [[Gen.37.5|Gen 37:5]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂנאֹת‎</span> [[Prov.8.13|Prov 8:13]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂנֵא‎</span> [[Deut.4.42|Deut 4:42]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂנַאֲךָ‎</span> [[Exod.23.5|Exod 23:5]]; [[Prov.25.21|Prov 25:21]] plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂנְאֵי‎</span> [[Exod.18.21|Exod 18:21]] +, etc.; ***passive*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂנוּאָה‎</span> [[Gen.29.31|Gen 29:31]] +; masculine plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂנֻאֵי‎</span> [[2Sam.5.8|2Sam 5:8]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׂנְאוּ‎</span>); — ***hate*** (often opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָהֵב‎</span>): 

**1.** human; 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with accusative of person [[Gen.26.27|Gen 26:27]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.37.5|Gen 37:5]]; [[Gen.37.8|Gen 37:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.11.7|Judg 11:7]]; [[2Sam.13.22|2Sam 13:22]]; [[Amos.5.10|Amos 5:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּעֵב‎</span>) + 17 t. (evil-doers [[Ps.26.5|Ps 26:5]]; [[Ps.31.7|Ps 31:7]]; [[Ps.139.21|Ps 139:21]]), + (object wife) [[Judg.14.16|Judg 14:16]]; [[Judg.15.2|Judg 15:2]] (twice in verse); + passive participle, of wife, [[Gen.29.31|Gen 29:31]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.21.15|Deut 21:15]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.21.16|Deut 21:16]]; [[Deut.21.17|Deut 21:17]], compare [[Prov.30.23|Prov 30:23]] figurative of Zion [[Isa.60.15|Isa 60:15]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲזוּבָה‎</span>); specifically of sexual revulsion [[2Sam.13.15|2Sam 13:15]] (twice in verse) (+ accusative of congnate meaning with verb), [[Deut.22.13|Deut 22:13]]; [[Deut.22.16|Deut 22:16]]; [[Deut.24.3|Deut 24:3]] so, object man (of Jerusalem under figure of harlot) [[Ezek.16.37|Ezek 16:37]] passive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂנֻאֵי נֶפֶשׁ דָּוִד‎</span> [[2Sam.5.8|2Sam 5:8]] (but see obscure); reflexive (accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשׁוֺ‎</span>) [[Prov.29.24|Prov 29:24]], absolute [[Eccl.3.8|Eccl 3:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** with accusative of thing, [[Ezek.35.6|Ezek 35:6]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּדָם אָשַׁמְתָּ‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] Toy), [[Eccl.2.17|Eccl 2:17]]; [[Eccl.2.18|Eccl 2:18]], especially evil [[Exod.18.21|Exod 18:21]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Mic.3.2|Mic 3:2]]; [[Ps.45.7|Ps 45:7]] + 10 t., virtue, etc. [[Mic.3.2|Mic 3:2]]; [[Prov.1.22|Prov 1:22]] + 4 t. 

**2.** subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; object perverse Israel [[Amos.6.8|Amos 6:8]] (its palaces), [[Hos.9.15|Hos 9:15]]; [[Jer.12.8|Jer 12:8]] wickedness [[Ps.5.6|Ps 5:6]]; [[Ps.11.5|Ps 11:5]] idolatry and evil [[Amos.5.21|Amos 5:21]]; [[Isa.1.14|Isa 1:14]]; [[Isa.61.8|Isa 61:8]]; [[Jer.44.4|Jer 44:4]]; [[Mal.2.16|Mal 2:16]] + 5 t. 

**3.** ***Participle active***<sub>54</sub> as adjective [[Isa.66.5|Isa 66:5]] (as verb with 1 singular pronoun [[Isa.61.8|Isa 61:8]], **2** above); usually substantive, [[Prov.13.24|Prov 13:24]] ***one hating his son*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹהֵב‎</span>); elsewhere = ***enemy foe*** (usually construct or with suffix), singular and plural (often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹיֵב‎</span>, sometimes opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹהֵב‎</span>): foe of man [[Exod.23.5|Exod 23:5]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Gen.24.60|Gen 24:60]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Lev.26.17|Lev 26:17]] ([[BDB#H|H]]) +, nation [[Exod.1.10|Exod 1:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Esth.9.1|Esth 9:1]]; [[Esth.9.5|Esth 9:5]]; [[Esth.9.16|Esth 9:16]] +, absolute [[Prov.26.24|Prov 26:24]]; [[Prov.27.6|Prov 27:6]], (c. 31 t. in all); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא שׂנֵא‎</span> with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, ***a no-hater to*** one [[Deut.4.42|Deut 4:42]]; [[Deut.19.4|Deut 19:4]]; [[Deut.19.6|Deut 19:6]]; [[Josh.20.5|Josh 20:5]], and (without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא‎</span>) [[Deut.19.11|Deut 19:11]] foe of good [[Mic.3.2|Mic 3:2]], compare [[Job.34.17|Job 34:17]] + 3 t., of evil [[Exod.18.21|Exod 18:21]]; [[Prov.28.1|Prov 28:1]], compare [[Prov.15.27|Prov 15:27]] of suretyship [[Prov.11.15|Prov 11:15]] (i.e. not giving it); foes of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Exod.20.5|Exod 20:5]] = [[Deut.5.9|Deut 5:9]]; [[Deut.7.10|Deut 7:10]] (twice in verse); [[2Chr.19.2|2Chr 19:2]]. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׂנֵא‎</span> [[Prov.14.17|Prov 14:17]] ***is hated***, so v[[Prov.14.20|Prov 14:20]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person ***by***, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> **5 d**). **Pi\`el** ***Participle*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂנְאִי‎</span> [[Job.31.29|Job 31:29]]; [[Ps.55.13|Ps 55:13]] plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂנְאֵי‎</span> [[Ps.81.16|Ps 81:16]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂנְאַי‎</span> [[2Sam.22.41|2Sam 22:41]] +, etc.; — ***enemy*** (**Qal 3**) \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹיֵב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָר‎</span>, etc.: 

**1.** personal and national, [[Job.31.29|Job 31:29]]; [[Deut.33.11|Deut 33:11]] (poem), [[2Sam.22.41|2Sam 22:41]] = [[Ps.18.41|Ps 18:41]]; [[Ps.44.8|Ps 44:8]]; [[Ps.44.11|Ps 44:11]]; [[Ps.55.13|Ps 55:13]]; [[Ps.68.2|Ps 68:2]]; [[Ps.89.24|Ps 89:24]]. 

**2.** of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Num.10.35|Num 10:35]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.32.41|Deut 32:41]] (poem), [[Ps.81.16|Ps 81:16]]; [[Ps.83.3|Ps 83:3]]; [[Ps.139.21|Ps 139:21]]. 

**3.** of wisdom [[Prov.8.36|Prov 8:36]].
